blurb: Implement the `accumulate` operation, which, given a collection and an operation to perform on each element of the collection, returns a new collection containing the result of applying that operation to each element of the input collection.
source: Conversation with James Edward Gray II

custom.allowed-to-not-compile: Stub doesn't compile because there is no type specified for _function and _closure arguments. This exercise teaches students about the use of function pointers and closures, therefore specifying the type of arguments for them would reduce learning.
